Event.Text: Our sensors picked up a single slow moving entity in the distance. After approaching closer, we discovered a single lone survivor. He had a crudely painted on moustache and monocle on his visor, and a large brown rucksack slung over his shoulder. As he notices you, he exclaims "Good day fellow travelers! Congratulations on being today's first customer! I have a proposition for you all. If you were to supply me with about 10 units of alcohol, in return you can have all that is within my bag of treasures!"

Choice.Text: {Charlatan} Attempt to convince the Well Dressed Survivor into revealing the contents of the rucksack
{Gambler} Propose a coin toss, where the winner gets it all.
